name: [LD41]Spawn & Blade
description:
This is an Ludum Dare 41 game.

Not sure what I was trying to combine now...

Just slash, dash and move foward!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move, note that you cannot move backwards(left), A or Left key do parry instead.

Press J or Z to attack, forward(D or Right) + attack = dash attack. Other = slash attack.

Press K or X to spawn warrier, which will cost 5 of the score.

There is an end, where you can see the final score.

There is no game over, you can spawn warrier even after wiped out.
